description: This Dart source file defines theming configurations for a Flutter application, including a color palette and a theme data generator with styling for various UI components.

classes.name: OceanPalette
classes.description: Contains static color definitions used across the app's theme.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: Provides methods to generate a customized ThemeData object and surface decorations.

methods.name: OceanTheme.themeData
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with Ocean's custom styling and color scheme.

methods.name: OceanTheme.gradientSurface
methods.description: Returns a BoxDecoration with a linear gradient used for surfaces in the UI.
